alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:17PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow and patchy blowing snow. New snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, with locally higher amounts possible over the highest elevations. * WHERE...The Black Mesa area including Blue Gap, Black Mesa, Shonto, and the Navajo National Monument. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could led to very difficult travel. Patchy blowing snow could reduce visibility at times. Hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast through 11 PM Tonight: Blue Gap 2 to 4 inches. Black Mesa 2 to 4 inches. Shonto 1 to 3 inches. Navajo National Monument 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
